messages.message: Thanks @Rakesh. The problem here is what you mention at the end - when you run documents through the app you get empty/inconsistent results. Building this for a potential customer where they would need to send these docs through.
@Rakesh can i get this doc you’re using and the prompt so I can test it as an app?

I think the problem is that we are not getting these settings into the built app ?
I am using these docs that @Will McDermott shared above
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1695865665717649?thread_ts=1695865627.607399&cid=C0516UPPMT3

ya you’re right the reader profile isn’t taken by the generate_flow endpoint and put into the generated flow that’s published. @Elan Sharony since you were working on generate_flow, could you take a look?

I think what we need to do is copy the reader_profile from the project if there is one and then change the process_files step to point at that reader profile.
Definitely, do we plan to backport this fix? @Eric Han
